title: Scholarship | Rathinam College of Arts & Science
meta_description: Rathinam's offers a set of scholarship programs for its students at the time of enrollment. A few common ones include Chief ministerâ€™s Award to SC/ST students, Backward Classes department (state) scholarship to BC/MBC/ DNC Students, and Tamil Nadu Chief Minister Farmer Scholarship.

title: Pay Fees | Rathinam College of Arts & Science
meta_description: The college fee will be intimated at the time of admission. The college fee prescribed per semester to be paid before the beginning of each semester (as per the payment schedule given by the Institution).
